label: 一向衆
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 3:  Medieval Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1990
説明文: Regional leagues of local military lords (kokujin), peasant warriors (jizamurai), and cultivators united by an underlying belief in the teachings of the Jōdo Shin sect that fueled resistance to the authority of the military governor (shugo).　[国人、地侍、浄土真宗、守護]
